actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States providing that the Supreme Court may not render an opinion or decision in cases in which less than a certain number of Justices concur.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that the Supreme Court of the United States shall not render an opinion or decision in any case in which less than a two to one majority of all Justices present and sitting concur.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States providing that the Supreme Court may not render an opinion or decision in cases in which less than a certain number of Justices concur.
